Original:
藏身在士林夜市小巷內的溫馨酒吧，因為參加朋友的生日派對讓我對這樣的小酒吧有了興趣。
雖然是包場，有固定的酒單，現場的服務人員卻沒有一點懈怠，貼心的照顧到每一個人的飲酒習慣跟口感上的稍微調整，讓我們整個慶生過程中感受到溫暖。
以往習慣到每一家酒吧時都會跟吧檯人員聊一下店裡面有什麼特殊的酒或者想要呈現什麼樣感覺。
讓我們很驚艷的是wake up bar是以「茶酒」做研究來呈現不一樣的口感，對於女孩子來說是非常適合的，不會過於甜膩也不會讓酒精濃度沖昏頭👍
現場氣氛來說，讓年輕人感覺到融洽，也讓我們這些有年紀的大姐姐們不會有違和感。

過程中意外發現，老闆們都很會唱歌ㄟ，歌聲很療癒，老歌、新歌都信手拈來，很用心的照顧每一個層面的客人。

現場人員腦袋瓜裡面也是有東西的，很能夠聊的起來，就算一個人前往，也不會因為年紀而有所格格不入。

二訪時候應該會找個兩三位好友一起慢慢品嚐每一種酒，再好好感受吧台的熱情。
EN:
The warm bar hidden in the alley of Shilin Night Market, because participating in my friend's birthday party made me interested in such a small bar.
Although it is a charter, there are fixed wine lists, but the service staff at the scene did not slack at all. It took care of everyone's drinking habits and a slight adjustment in the taste, so that we could feel warmth during the entire celebration process.
In the past, when I was used to every bar, I would talk to the bar staff about what special wines in the store or what they wanted to present.
What is amazing is that Wake Up Bar uses "tea wine" to study different tastes, which is very suitable for girls.
At the atmosphere of the scene, young people feel harmonious, and it also makes us older sisters do not have a sense of disobedience.

During the process, I found that the bosses were very good at singing, the singing was healed, and the old songs and new songs were handy, and they took care of every level of guests at all levels.

There is something in the head of the people at the scene, and it is very able to talk about it. Even if a person goes, it will not be incompatible because of age.

During the second visit, you should find two or three friends to slowly taste each wine together, and then feel the enthusiasm of the bar.
